Description: You let out a charming cry, dealing emotional damage to any creature in range that can hear you. This move automatically hits for fairy damage unless a creature is in the invulnerable stages of Fly, Dig, Bounce, etc.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d4 at level 5, 1d12 at level 10, and 4d4 at level 17.
